name: pastesafe-web-app
description: instant web cryptography. encrypt in as you type in realtime. share and decrypt ciphertext.

scripts.build: npm run clean -s && run-p build-scripts build-styles && echo Done production build.
scripts.build-debug: npm run clean -s && run-p build-scripts-debug build-styles-debug && echo Done debug build.
scripts.build-scripts: browserify source/script.tsx -p tsify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > dist/script.bundle.js

author: Chase Moskal
